channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Home Alone
channel.desc: Children, Adventure, Comedy, Family 1990 Following a fight with his elder brother, 8-year-old Kevin wishes his family disappeared. He wakes up on Christmas Day to find his family gone, and now he must protect his house from two naive thieves, using his wits and humor. Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Roberts Blossom, Chris Columbus, John Hughes, Catherine O'Hara.
